name: Irontoe Mudsputters
flavorText: "Good, heavy steel. Nice flex around the ankle, good weight in the toes. A solid pair of boots. What, did you need them to sparkle?" —Kormac the Templar
flavorTextHtml: "Good, heavy steel. Nice flex around the ankle, good weight in the toes. A solid pair of boots. What, did you need them to sparkle?" —Kormac the Templar

secondary.textHtml: Gain up to 29% increased movement speed based on amount of Life missing. [25 - 30]%
